result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Austin D. Valdez

records.addlTxt:
1:06 PM Defendant Austin D. Valdez in court.  Attorney Jeremiah Wolfgang Meyer-O'Day in court for Austin D. Valdez.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Delain in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Meyer-O'Day does not yet have discovery.  State advises an offer was extended but due to new case is unsure if the offer remains.  Matter reset.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Return date scheduled for December 20, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on December 20, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on December 2, 2022 at 11:15 am.

No violent or abusive contact with k.M.L.  No contact with J.L.L., their residence or employment.  Absolute sobriety.  DE may return one time upon prior notice and with LE to retrieve any personal belongings

2:37 PM Prosecuting attorney Gabriel David Arevalo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Austin D. Valdez appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Allison A Markoski appeared by video for Austin D. Valdez.  Defendant received and waives reading of complaint.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties.  DE qualifies for PD representation.  Atty Markoski confirms DE's address.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date. State recommends a signature bond.  No objection from Atty Markoski.  $1,000.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows: No violent or abusive contact with k.M.L.  No contact with J.L.L., their residence or employment.  Absolute sobriety.  DE may return one time upon prior notice and with LE to retrieve any personal belongings.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Return date scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on October 20, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on September 23, 2022 at 10:15 am.
